ComicInfo.Summary:
Spring has just about sprung, so isn't it only fair that you spring for this great issue of MAD? What else are you gonna spend three-and-a-half bucks on?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:25:15. [Issue ID 130297]
